EmailTemplate.name: Executive Briefing New York.Maybe responses
EmailTemplate.subject: We Hope to See You at the VMTurbo Executive Briefing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We do hope to see you at the reception on Thursday, February 20th.
When your schedule becomes established, feel free to revisit <http://bit.ly/1hkhpeh> this invitation and click “yes” to register. We’ll send you a quick reminder in a few days.
Meanwhile, download this free whitepaper <http://bit.ly/1kYVlLK> to learn more about how VMTurbo helps you gain control of your virtual datacenter so that you can relax and focus on other important aspects of your job.
Sincerely,
The VMTurbo Team
